Ini Jadwal Pesawat Sriwijaya yang Dibatalkan Hari Ini
07 Nov 2019, 08:53 by Tim detikcom


Foto: detikFoto

Jakarta - Banyak penumpang Sriwijaya Air yang mengeluhkan gagal terbang hari ini. Mereka akhirnya banyak yang membeli lagi tiket penerbangan maskapai lain.Banyaknya penerbangan Sriwijaya yang dibatalkan hari ini akibat buntut putus hubungan antara perusahaan dengan PT Garuda Indonesia Tbk (GIAA).Berdasarkan informasi yang tertera di Bandara Internasional Soekarno-Hatta, berikut jadwal terbang Sriwijaya yang batal pada Kamis (7/11/2019), seperti dikutip dari CNBC Indonesia:

SJ272 tujuan Bandara Ngurah Rai Denpasar
SJ050 tujuan Bandara H.A.S. Hanandjoeddin Belitung
SJ088 tujuan Bandara Radin Inten II Lampung
SJ248 tujuan Bandara Abdul Rachman Saleh Malang

Penumpang Sriwijaya Air pun terlantar di Bandara Internasional Soekarno-Hatta Tangerang, Banten. Mereka belum mendapatkan kejelasan karena sejumlah penerbangan tiba-tiba dibatalkan.Rini Suryati menjadi salah seorang penumpang yang turut mengalami nasib nahas. Dia baru mengetahui adanya pembatalan ketika terlanjur tiba di bandara."Kita mau ke Malang. Awalnya pakai Garuda, tapi penuh. Terus disarankan pakai Sriwijaya, karena anaknya Garuda, dan dapat yang jam 13.10," ujarnya ketika dihubungi CNBC Indonesia.Dia bersama rombongan tiba di bandara pukul 12.00 WIB hari ini. Ketika itu, sudah banyak penumpang lain yang menumpuk di sejumlah titik. Para penumpang pun marah-marah."Ternyata penerbangan Sriwijaya yang ke Lampung juga tidak tahu juntrungannya kapan terbang. Seharusnya ke Lampung jam 7 pagi sampai sekarang juga tidak tahu, kapan akan terbang," katanya menceritakan.Kegeraman juga dirasakan penumpang lain, Anang Purwanto. Dia memilih menghabiskan waktu dengan cara menunggu di sebuah coffee shop, sambil menanti kejelasan."Tidak ada penjelasan resmi dari Sriwijaya Air terkait cancel dan pembatalan penerbangan. Penumpang terlantar," Anang kesal.Belum ada konfirmasi resmi dari pihak Sriwijaya mengenai pembatalan terbang sejumlah penerbangan.Berita ini bisa dilihat juga di CNBC Indonesia melalui tautan berikut ini: Cerita-Cerita Miris Penumpang Sriwijaya Terlantar di Soetta Simak Video "Garuda Indonesia Larang Penumpang Bawa MacBook Pro 15 Inci"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ang/ang)

This is the Sriwijaya Flight Schedule Canceled Today
Nov 7 2019, 08:53 by Tim detikcom


Photo: detikPhoto

Jakarta - Many Sriwijaya Air passengers complained about failing to fly today. They finally bought more airline tickets for other airlines. Many Sriwijaya flights were canceled today due to the end of the relationship between the company and PT Garuda Indonesia Tbk (GIAA). Based on the information printed at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, following Sriwijaya's flight schedule was canceled on Thursday (11/07/2019), as quoted by CNBC Indonesia:

SJ272 to Denpasar Ngurah Rai Airport
SJ050 destination H.A.S. Airport Hanandjoeddin Belitung
SJ088 to Radin Inten II Airport in Lampung
SJ248 to Abdul Rachman Saleh Airport, Malang

Sriwijaya Air passengers were also stranded at Soekarno-Hatta International Airport, Tangerang, Banten. They have not received clarity because a number of flights were suddenly canceled. Rini Suryati became one of the passengers who also suffered a misfortune. He only learned of the cancellation when he arrived at the airport. "We want to go to Malang. At first I used Garuda, but it was full. Then I was advised to use Sriwijaya, because his son was Garuda, and got it at 13.10," he said when contacted by CNBC Indonesia. at the airport at 12.00 WIB today. At that time, there were already many other passengers piled up at a number of points. The passengers were angry. "It turned out that Sriwijaya flight to Lampung also did not know when it was flying. It was supposed to go to Lampung at 7 am until now, too, and did not know when it would fly," he said. The fear was also felt by another passenger, Anang Purwanto. He chose to spend time by waiting in a coffee shop, while waiting for clarity. "There was no official explanation from Sriwijaya Air regarding cancel and flight cancellations. Passengers were left stranded," Anang was upset. There was no official confirmation from Sriwijaya regarding the flight cancellation of a number of flights.
